name: Black plane
description:
This is a maze adventure game.

You are a young girl with brave qualities and very curious about the outside world. On this day, you discovered a building that looked beautiful and full of charm, with a kind of magic attracting her to go there. Sure enough, there are demons on the road. You can cleverly use the bomb in your hand to kill the demon. Do you dare to take risks?

Game controls

Placing bombs=Q

Character Movement=WASD

Gameplay

After the bomb is placed, it will take a while for it to explode

You need to use a bomb to eliminate the demon

And please be careful to avoid demons

Touch the devil, you will die

Game features

Exciting game scenes

A heart stirring and powerful demon
